column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I love Common Bond! A friend brought me here to grab some pastries on my latest visit to Houston. I got a pistachio croissant
column2: a goat cheese and fig macaroon
column3: and a strawberry patchouli macaroon. I liked the strawberry macaroon and the croissant a lot
column4: but I was not a huge fan of the fig macaroon. The goat cheese aspect of it was great
column5: but the fig was a little strange for me. The atmosphere of the place is lofty
column8: but it fills up very quickly. Especially on weekend mornings! It is worth waiting in line for.
